entry.def: A tablespoon is a fairly large spoon used for serving food and in cooking.

entry.tran: 一大汤匙(或大调羹)的量
entry.def: You can refer to an amount of food resting on a tablespoon as a tablespoon of food.

means.word_mean: 1. as much as a tablespoon will hold
2. a spoon larger than a dessert spoon; used for serving
